verses.arabic: بِسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِنَّاۤ أَرۡسَلۡنَا نُوحًا إِلَىٰ قَوۡمِهِۦۤ أَنۡ أَنذِرۡ قَوۡمَكَ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن یَأۡتِیَهُمۡ عَذَابٌ أَلِیمࣱ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent Noah to his people, [saying], "Warn your people before there comes to them a painful punishment."

verses.arabic: قَالَ یَـٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّی لَكُمۡ نَذِیرࣱ مُّبِینٌ
verses.translation: He said, "O my people, indeed I am to you a clear warner,

verses.arabic: أَنِ ٱعۡبُدُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَطِیعُونِ
verses.translation: [Saying], 'Worship Allah, fear Him and obey me.

verses.arabic: یَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَیُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰۤ أَجَلࣲ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَاۤءَ لَا یُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Allah will forgive you of your sins and delay you for a specified term. Indeed, the time [set by] Allah, when it comes, will not be delayed, if you only knew.' "

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّی دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِی لَیۡلࣰا وَنَهَارࣰا
verses.translation: He said, "My Lord, indeed I invited my people [to truth] night and day.

verses.arabic: فَلَمۡ یَزِدۡهُمۡ دُعَاۤءِیۤ إِلَّا فِرَارࣰا
verses.translation: But my invitation increased them not except in flight.

verses.arabic: وَإِنِّی كُلَّمَا دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ لِتَغۡفِرَ لَهُمۡ جَعَلُوۤا۟ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمۡ فِیۤ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ وَٱسۡتَغۡشَوۡا۟ ثِیَابَهُمۡ وَأَصَرُّوا۟ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُوا۟ ٱسۡتِكۡبَارࣰا
verses.translation: And indeed, every time I invited them that You may forgive them, they put their fingers in their ears, covered themselves with their garments, persisted, and were arrogant with [great] arrogance.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّی دَعَوۡتُهُمۡ جِهَارࣰا
verses.translation: Then I invited them publicly.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ إِنِّیۤ أَعۡلَنتُ لَهُمۡ وَأَسۡرَرۡتُ لَهُمۡ إِسۡرَارࣰا
verses.translation: Then I announced to them and [also] confided to them secretly

verses.arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُوا۟ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارࣰا
verses.translation: And said, 'Ask forgiveness of your Lord. Indeed, He is ever a Perpetual Forgiver.

verses.arabic: یُرۡسِلِ ٱلسَّمَاۤءَ عَلَیۡكُم مِّدۡرَارࣰا
verses.translation: He will send [rain from] the sky upon you in [continuing] showers

verses.arabic: وَیُمۡدِدۡكُم بِأَمۡوَ ٰ⁠لࣲ وَبَنِینَ وَیَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ جَنَّـٰتࣲ وَیَجۡعَل لَّكُمۡ أَنۡهَـٰرࣰا
verses.translation: And give you increase in wealth and children and provide for you gardens and provide for you rivers.

verses.arabic: مَّا لَكُمۡ لَا تَرۡجُونَ لِلَّهِ وَقَارࣰا
verses.translation: What is [the matter] with you that you do not attribute to Allah [due] grandeur

verses.arabic: وَقَدۡ خَلَقَكُمۡ أَطۡوَارًا
verses.translation: While He has created you in stages?

verses.arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَوۡا۟ كَیۡفَ خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ سَبۡعَ سَمَـٰوَ ٰ⁠تࣲ طِبَاقࣰا
verses.translation: Do you not consider how Allah has created seven heavens in layers

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلَ ٱلۡقَمَرَ فِیهِنَّ نُورࣰا وَجَعَلَ ٱلشَّمۡسَ سِرَاجࣰا
verses.translation: And made the moon therein a [reflected] light and made the sun a burning lamp?

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنۢبَتَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ نَبَاتࣰا
verses.translation: And Allah has caused you to grow from the earth a [progressive] growth.

verses.arabic: ثُمَّ یُعِیدُكُمۡ فِیهَا وَیُخۡرِجُكُمۡ إِخۡرَاجࣰا
verses.translation: Then He will return you into it and extract you [another] extraction.

verses.arabic: وَٱللَّهُ جَعَلَ لَكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بِسَاطࣰا
verses.translation: And Allah has made for you the earth an expanse

verses.arabic: لِّتَسۡلُكُوا۟ مِنۡهَا سُبُلࣰا فِجَاجࣰا
verses.translation: That you may follow therein roads of passage.' "

verses.arabic: قَالَ نُوحࣱ رَّبِّ إِنَّهُمۡ عَصَوۡنِی وَٱتَّبَعُوا۟ مَن لَّمۡ یَزِدۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَوَلَدُهُۥۤ إِلَّا خَسَارࣰا
verses.translation: Noah said, "My Lord, indeed they have disobeyed me and followed him whose wealth and children will not increase him except in loss.

verses.arabic: وَمَكَرُوا۟ مَكۡرࣰا كُبَّارࣰا
verses.translation: And they conspired an immense conspiracy.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ لَا تَذَرُنَّ ءَالِهَتَكُمۡ وَلَا تَذَرُنَّ وَدࣰّا وَلَا سُوَاعࣰا وَلَا یَغُوثَ وَیَعُوقَ وَنَسۡرࣰا
verses.translation: And said, 'Never leave your gods and never leave Wadd or Suwa' or Yaghuth and Ya'uq and Nasr.

verses.arabic: وَقَدۡ أَضَلُّوا۟ كَثِیرࣰاۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ إِلَّا ضَلَـٰلࣰا
verses.translation: And already they have misled many. And, [my Lord], do not increase the wrongdoers except in error."

verses.arabic: مِّمَّا خَطِیۤـَٔـٰتِهِمۡ أُغۡرِقُوا۟ فَأُدۡخِلُوا۟ نَارࣰا فَلَمۡ یَجِدُوا۟ لَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ أَنصَارࣰا
verses.translation: Because of their sins they were drowned and put into the Fire, and they found not for themselves besides Allah [any] helpers.

verses.arabic: وَقَالَ نُوحࣱ رَّبِّ لَا تَذَرۡ عَلَى ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مِنَ ٱلۡكَـٰفِرِینَ دَیَّارًا
verses.translation: And Noah said, "My Lord, do not leave upon the earth from among the disbelievers an inhabitant.

verses.arabic: إِنَّكَ إِن تَذَرۡهُمۡ یُضِلُّوا۟ عِبَادَكَ وَلَا یَلِدُوۤا۟ إِلَّا فَاجِرࣰا كَفَّارࣰا
verses.translation: Indeed, if You leave them, they will mislead Your servants and not beget except [every] wicked one and [confirmed] disbeliever.

verses.arabic: رَّبِّ ٱغۡفِرۡ لِی وَلِوَ ٰ⁠لِدَیَّ وَلِمَن دَخَلَ بَیۡتِیَ مُؤۡمِنࣰا وَلِلۡمُؤۡمِنِینَ وَٱلۡمُؤۡمِنَـٰتِۖ وَلَا تَزِدِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِینَ إِلَّا تَبَارَۢا
verses.translation: My Lord, forgive me and my parents and whoever enters my house a believer and the believing men and believing women. And do not increase the wrongdoers except in destruction."
